Service Details: - Works as a Sponsorship Agreement Holder (SAH) with Citizenship and Immigration Canada (CIC) to sponsor refugee families- Members of this SAH include Christ Evangelical Lutheran Church, Faith Lutheran Church, St. Andrew's Anglican Church, St. Aidan's Anglican Church, St. Mary’s Anglican Church, The Cathedral Church of St. Michael and All Angels (Kelowna), St. George's Anglican Church (West Kelowna), St. Margaret's Anglican Church (Peachland), and St. Francis Anglican Church (Lake Country)
